attributes.action: Make prostutution legal in the uk..let women be safe from harm whilst working!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have decided to start this petition to try and get the goverment to make sure working girls have somewhere safe to work so they are not in fear and can do their job without intimidation!
Please add your name as everyone will make a difference. 
This petition is far too late for our 5 ipswich angels but lets try and stop anything like that happening again..with your support we can make a difference!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
